data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jordal, Bjarte H. (2009): The Madagascan genus Dolurgocleptes Schedl (Coleoptera: Curculionidae, Scolytinae): description of a new species and transfer to the tribe Polygraphini. Zootaxa 2014: 41-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185917
